ahase hada paya atha basnahirata barawa hada thibena nisa nagena hira tharu tikak penennata atha.ada hada nothibuna nam mita wada hodin tharu dakinnata thibuni.kamak natha rata hada paya thiyeddi amuthu lassanak atha ra kaluwara hama thanama welagena sitina wita eeta udin sayamak halagena giya wani lassanak dakinnata atha.nathnam aatha damu balbayaka malanika eliyak watuna waniyaâ€¦obe jiwithaya methek liyawi aththe nagaraya nam me kathawa obata notheranawa nisakaya.wasanawakata mage upan gama kanda udarata wuwaya eetath wada wasanawakata mahanuwara sita kilomitar 20k pamana aatha gamaka wasaya karannata ma hata wasanawa thibi atha.yamkisi hethuwakata mage piya mawage gama jiwathwima sandaha thora gaththanam ma jiwithe methek lada me athdakim metharam rasawath nowanu atha.manda eya nuwarata kilomitar dekathunak meha wimayi.

jathyanthara kantha dinaya samajaya, deshapalanaya ha aarthika widyawa yana kshethrayanhi kanthawan kotharam durata pamina athdayi samarime dinayak bawata pathwa athi athara, deshapalana mulayan wisin akhanda asamanatha pilibandawa danuwath kirima sandaha wada warjana ha wirodhatha sanwidhanaya karanu labayi.

apata loku sathutak athi wuye wasara kipayakata pera pala wu â€œ mala nethata panaâ€ sankalpaya sakriya wi thibenu dakimeni.thawath wasara kipayakata pasuwa, shri jayawardhanapura wishwawidyalaye kathikacharyawarayeku lesa sewayata bandunu aariyapala perera mahatha akshi thakshanika niladhariyeku lesa puhunu wi, gangodawila pradeshaye maranayak sidu wu wita nopamawa, as galawimata pawichchi karana mewalam pettiyath, as bahalana rijipom pettiyath ragena â€œmama yanawa as dekak gannayiâ€ kiyamin wishwawidyalaye aacharya niwasayen pitawi yana awastha rashiyak daka aththemi.
